EmailTemplate.name: Jan10Web:Disrupt-Yourself.Thank You Jan10
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending our Webinar on Career Disruption
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for taking the time to attend our New Year webinar, “Disrupt Yourself: Four Rules for Reinventing Your Career in 2013." To follow-up on the information provided on Thursday, January 10th, please find links to reference resources below. Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-disrupt-yourself-four-rules-reinventing-your-career-2013> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Disrupt-Yourself-Webinar_Slides.pdf> <http://www.mycoachingcircle.com/>Featured Speaker Whitney Johnson Website <http://www.whitneyjohnson.com/> Whitney's Book: Dare, Dream Do <http://www.amazon.com/Dare-Dream-Do-Remarkable-Things/dp/1937134121> We invite you to sign-up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com <mailto:webinar@mbopartners.com>.
Thank you, MBO PARTNERS t: 1-800-220-0469
e: info@mbopartners.com
